name: WYRM (EuleMitKeule)
description:
---WYRM (ALPHA)----

You are the DWARF.
Your goal is to escape the caves and mines while the WYRM is chasing you.
Use your drill to get through walls, but don't fall into the spikes or jump into the stalagtites.
Pick up dynamite to get through walls faster.

Controls:

Walk: a/d or left/right
Jump: space
Drill: left mouse button
Throw: right mouse button
Aim: mouse

CREDITS:

Idea:         Ben Korinth, Lennard Beers

Game Design:    Lennard Beers

Graphics:    Christian Kipke, Ben Korinth

Programming:    Lennard Beers

Level Design:    Michael Malek, Lennard Beers, Ben Korinth

Music:        Christian Kipke

SFX:        8bit sound pack by "SoundsByDane"
